Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following an incident at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line continues to be temporarily suspended following a recent incident at Howard.

Shuttle bus service is available between Howard and Skokie/Dempster, serving all affected stations during normal hours of operation.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include the #97 Skokie bus route.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #57 Laramie Temporary Northbound Reroute near Laramie/Lake
ShortDescription: Northbound 57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Washington, Cicero, Chicago and Laramie: due to, street blockage near Laramie/Lake.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Washington, Cicero, Chicago and Laramie: due to, street blockage near Laramie/Lake.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Homan/Augusta
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Chicago, Kedzie, Grand, Augusta and Homan: due to, street blockage near Homan/Augusta.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Homan, Chicago, Kedzie, Grand, Augusta and Homan: due to, street blockage near Homan/Augusta.

Allow extra travel time.
